name: Hex Master
description:
Hex Master:
A simple, fun to play hex based strategy game. 
- Save the kingdom from an undead rebellion in Campaign mode.
- Build up your own army in Skirmish mode.
- Battle your friends in CO-OP mode.

Coming soon:
- Randomly generated Skirmish mode.
- Online multiplayer game mode
-CO-OP mode and Skirmish mode updates and more maps

Updates:
- Updates to this game are plentiful and there are constant upgrades and edits taking place.

By Dark Myth Games
